synopsis: Mysterious life forms we called “Phantoms” erased humans completely. But only a schoolboy and three schoolgirls, Masashi, Sanae, Yaeko and Anna have been surviving on the earth. Masashi believes that this happening seems to be after school so that people who were disappeared will surely come back. Although there are full of anxiety and mystery around them, they spend every day rather happily not so sadly without inconvenience to food, clothing and shelter, also four of them enjoy their life at their easygoing pace on the earth!
